name: Qubetics
description: The Qubetics Network is a revolutionary blockchain ecosystem, designed to unify multiple networks and reshape the landscape of decentralized technology. As the worldâ€™s first Layer-1, EVM-compatible, aggregated multichain blockchain, Qubetics aims to enhance scalability, security, and interoperability. By bridging major blockchain platforms such as Ethereum, Solana, Cosmos, Bitcoin and more, it enables seamless cross-chain interactions, setting a new standard for decentralized applications (dApps), digital payments, and asset tokenization.
